website_summaries.verdict: This canine flea and tick preventative is a reasonable choice for saving a few dollars, and produces similar results and concerns as other options.
pros: Earns praise for controlling fleas and ticks on most dogs for the entire 4 weeks of application
Price is somewhat less than more popular name brands
cons: Applicator can be difficult to use on dogs with dense fur
Some owners report reactions in their dogs, such as lethargy
May not work on all dogs

customer_reviews.title: 5 paws up! It worked on my 75lb furbaby
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I live in Minnesota and as soon as “spring” hit, I found 3 ticks on my 75lb Great Pyrenees-Golden mix in 2 days and decided I needed a fix STAT. Bought this, parted his fur really well, applied it directly to his skin and haven’t seen a tick on him since! He did not have any skin irritation or any side effects of any kind and I’m kind of a crazy dog mom. Great product. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nerve damage possible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible side effects on our Jack Russell/ Chihuahua mix! Looked up the main ingredient and after research found it has horrible record of side effects to include nervous system issues and possible nerve damage. Especially in cats and small dogs. Our 12lb dog was showing all those issues. I know to research the ingredients in the product and not just the product from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Wrisley

customer_reviews.title: Ticks are Abundant
customer_reviews.text: I gave a rating of 3 because ProSense Flea and Tick Medicine seems to work well for fleas but not ticks. I've heard from many people that ticks are really bad this year. We take our puppy out to the woods frequently and she's gotten ticks everytime. Is this medication suppossed to stop the ticks from attaching as they've done or suppossed to kill them once attached? And if so, how long does it take for them to die?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second flea and tick season that I’m using Peo-Sense 5. Fleas aren’t a problem in the climate zone where I live, but ticks and mosquitoes absolutely are, and my dog hasn’t had any ticks, or been bothered by mosquitoes since I started using Pro-Sense 5. The active ingredients are exactly the same, and in the same proportions as the brands sold by Veterinarians for almost 5 times the price of Pro-Sense 5. I’d have no hesitation recommending Pro-Sense 5 , to keep your pet free from biting critters.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: This is a great flea medicine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flea medicine. We have deer in our neighborhood. It has prevented my dogs from getting fleas and ticks.
customer_reviews.author: KKTX

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep the fleas away.
customer_reviews.text: Once I applied this to my pet, I could tell that some of the fleas were dying, but after a week I could tell it was no longer working. I normally use an edible flea medication, which works great, but my dog didn't like the flavor anymore. I do not recommend it. I did find a meaty chewable which he loves and works (Bravecto). It has been two months on Bravecto and he is still flea free.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Carlotta

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had ticks or fleas! Easy to apply and I haven't noticed any negative side effects.
customer_reviews.author: joweber77

customer_reviews.title: Useless Against Fleas
customer_reviews.text: Gave this product two starts, because I can say that we have had no issues with ticks since using it. That being said, it has proven to be totally useless against the fleas here in New Jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Liz

customer_reviews.title: Mountain approved!
customer_reviews.text: Our backyard is 20 acres of mountain- literally! Ticks everywhere! This product is a life saver! Once applied, ticks were falling off.
customer_reviews.author: kristle

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a terrible reaction to this flea treatment. He scratched himself so hard he almost broke the skin ): I felt terrible! I used the cat one on my cat and they were fine, but I would not recommend this flea treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Oneill

customer_reviews.title: Works good, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: A product I have used a lot of times. I think you get 3 in the pack. I got exactly what I expected and good solid product with fast Amazon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: jojoRod

customer_reviews.title: WORKS OKAY.
customer_reviews.text: WORKED FOR A LITTLE BIT WITH FLEAS. WOULD USE AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Goat girl

customer_reviews.title: Burned the skin of my dog!
customer_reviews.text: This product badly burned my short haired 3 year old dog! Not worth the cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: cjw

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!! It works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my two dogs all the time.. it’s affordable and works GREAT!! My dogs have not had a tick or flea since using!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Effective.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No fleas since I’ve started using about 9 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: PBR

customer_reviews.title: fleas b gone
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. the value compares to higher priced products. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a low price. No issues with side effects.
customer_reviews.author: sirhcm

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Dog still scratching and seeing fleas after 3 applications. No good
customer_reviews.author: jermaine bass

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are vague and you need a magnifying glass to. read them. I called their 800 number for clarification and the responder was not very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my pup
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 4-pack and tried one on my young min pin mix. After applying he started acting really antisocial and skiddish. May work for your dog but this is just my experience with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Eh...its ok
customer_reviews.text: Works ok...still had a few fleas after application baths and combing
customer_reviews.author: David Oser

customer_reviews.title: Jury is out!
customer_reviews.text: My Corgi got some fleas before 1 month expired. It could have been he was at the top of the 32 pound weight range.
customer_reviews.author: Richard V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: There were only 2 capsules in box. Just opened today to apply to my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Doni Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Burnt my dog severely!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please do your research before purchasing this product, I wish that I had. This product chemically burnt my poor dog :( within hours of application he was in so much pain. We washed him several times with no relief. 24 hours later painful sores developed that required a vet visit, wound care and steroids. Our dog still isn’t the same, hiding throughout the day and very skiddish. This shouldn’t even be on the market!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it twice and my dog is still infested
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne DelMastro

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! I have found several live ticks on my dog since applying this 2 weeks ago. I feel awful for my dog, who is very long haired and it's difficult to find them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Product! Bad Side Affects!!
customer_reviews.text: The product left greasy/oily streaks where applied as instucted. But more concerning is it has also caused moderate to severe lethargic behavior since the day after applied on Nay 10th. Also causing itching and irritation. Had to take to vet where was instructed to bath in mild dish liquid soap and administer prescribed medication to help contradict these conditions caused by this product. My advice is to advoid at any offered price. Absolutely not worth your dog potentially suffering thru the sane symptoms as my dog went thru.
customer_reviews.author: DerbyDudeDon

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to deal with
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this stuff works or not. What I do know is that you have to cut the stem almost completely off the tube. The tube is hard and not opaque so you have no idea if you got it all out or not.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work!! My poor pug is suffering from these fleas. This product did not work at all. Very disappointed. So gotta wait a couple more weeks before I can put anything else on my poor pug. I even read the reviews and they we're all false. I can literally see the fleas on here. Very upset with this. My poor baby!!!
customer_reviews.author: becky hammer

customer_reviews.title: Fleas returned quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not provide the treatment advertised. It temporarily killed fleas but they returned in a matter of days. I’ll have to pay a little more, but I’d rather have a preventative that works.
customer_reviews.author: Donna P Hart

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my dogs and a week later they had ticks in their coats. I live in a rural area where ticks are a big problem and I guess I need to invest in something more expensive because this didn't work for either of them.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Defective product which does not work. Our vet confirmed this after our dog got fleas. They said that the chews are best.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all! Did slow the fleas down one bit!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Used as directed, didn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it didn't work on my dog. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nina0524

customer_reviews.title: Not effective for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: The product was not effective on our 70lb pit bull terrier. Our dog continuously scratched 5 hours later after applying the product.
customer_reviews.author: J Noble

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Product was worthless on both dogs I used product on. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Soto

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful!
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t helping I’m afraid that it might be a bad dose...?
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Lee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about two and a half weeks then having to reapply
customer_reviews.author: Consumer1966

customer_reviews.title: I applied the way the directions had read. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I applied the way the directions had read. I found a tick on my dog the day after I applied treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Kady Lockmon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, good price and a seller. Would shop again
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work on my pet. Just caused itching. Didn't kill fleas or repel them..
customer_reviews.author: jomar

product_meta.title: Pro-Sense 5 Flea and Tick Prevention for Dogs, 3 Month Supply Dog Flea and Tick Control Kills and Repels Fleas, Lice, Mosquitoes, Ticks and Mites
product_meta.description:
Size:33-66 lb.Pro-Sense brand offers a variety of proactive, sensible solutions for all of your pet’s healthcare and wellness needs. We know pet parenting can be tough, which is why we’ve improved our ingredients and benefits to make it easier than ever to care for them like any other member of your family. 

Pro-Sense 5 Flea and Tick Prevention For Dogs kills and repels fleas, ticks, mosquitoes, lice and mites. This topical tick and flea treatment for dogs prevents reinfestation of fleas and ticks for up to 4 weeks. For use only on dogs or puppies 12 weeks of age or older, weighing 33 to 66 lbs. Package contains a 3 month supply. Preventative is ready to use; no dilution necessary. Your dog does not have to be bitten for our product to start working. Let the repellent capabilities deter pests from your pet before its a problem. Trust Pro-Sense brand for flea and tick prevention for large dogs.
feature_bullets: DOG FLEA AND TICK CONTROL: Pro-Sense 5 is for dogs or puppies 12 weeks of age or older, weighing 33-66 lbs.
KILLS AND REPELS: Our flea and tick prevention for dogs both KILLS and REPELS fleas, ticks, mosquitoes, lice and mites, unlike our leading competitor Frontline Plus for Dogs.
FLEA AND TICK PREVENTION FOR DOGS: Prevents reinfestation of fleas and ticks for up to 4 weeks.
TOPICAL TREATMENT: Flea and tick prevention for large dogs is made easy with our topical formula. Simply follow the directions on the label to apply treatment to your dogs back.
3 MONTH SUPPLY: One package contains 3 different tubes for topical application each month.
